name: Fear the Void (itch)
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING: Some scenes contain flashing lights. A COMMUTE LIKE ANY OTHER

Something goes wrong during your subway journey home, leaving you in quiet darkness. Can you find your way back to reality? And are you sure you're alone?

A short atmospheric game made for Scream Jam 2021.

CONTROLS

WASD: Move
Mouse: Look
E: Interact

TEAM

2D Art & Coding:
Velislav Pachamanov

Coding:
Keegan Brakhage
Rafał Piechnik 

3D Environment, NPCs, Creatures & Animations:

3D Objects
